attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IS IT RIGHT THAT IF THE GOVERNMENT REALY WANTS TO ENCOURAGE THE "NO SMOKING ISSUE", THAT IT STILL ALLOWS THE SALE OF CIGARETTES IN PUBLIC PLACES, AND STILL COLLECTS THE MASSIVE TAX REVENUE THAT IT MAKES ON THEM, THE SAME COULD ALSO APPLY TO ALCOHOL, I ALSO BELIEVE THAT BANNING SMOKING IN PUBLIC PLACES WILL ALSO JUST ENCOURAGE MORE SMOKING AT HOME AND MAKE CHILDREN ENDURE EVEN MORE SMOKING AROUND THEM.

rejection.details: please re-draft without CAPITALS as this makes it hard to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
